SEARCH
Package icyllis.arc3d.core

Class GlyphRunList

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.core.GlyphRunList
@Internal public class GlyphRunList extends Object
GlyphRunList provides a buffer view to GlyphRuns and additional drawing info.
